page.title: 18THE COMMUNITY
page.content: There are a few local societies that cover our area. The Women's Institute have branches that cover part of the area and they meet monthly. For the elderly the Sithney Over Sixties offer meetings and outings but this organisation only covers a small part of our area. The churches offer a meeting place as well as occasional social activities. Sithney C.P. School has just become part of the County Council's Community Schools Programme which encourages the use of the school premises by all sections of the Community. The aim of the Programme is to make the school a centre for community life.
